answers.answer: Omg how exciting!!! Two days! Lucky! I don't even want to keep with my countdown cus I honestly feel like I'm super stuck on these same numbers so I just keep saying less then a month Lol. I'm scared about the tubes too, getting them tied as well. And just pretty much my health and babies with the diabetes and all there's more risk. With my two year old I got gestational diabetes and I was so sick the last weeks of pregnancy my sugar was not controlled at all so he was born hypoglycemic, and almost 11 lbs, so he had to stay in the nicu for about a week till they controlled his sugar. Tough times. I pray we don't go through the same but I can already tell we're heading the same route with me being so sick again. Goof luck though , can't wait for your labor story and to hear about your tubes getting tied and all. I want to hear it all! The good the bad I don't care. I need to know what to expect lol
Aww so exciting! We are expecting our 2nd baby, I'm only 18 weeks tho. Still very long wait! Update us when baby arrives. Good luck
I go for my section in 2 days aswell. Getting a bit scared now knowing he/she is defo coming out on Wednesday ekk

question: I know you guys are sick of these updates: -/ but to excited!!Still currently 3 cm. Still losing pieces of mucus plug. And still having contractions.  Which L&D confirmed.  "Pre-labor" first stage of labor.Good news we only have 2 days until being induced.  So won't have to out up with these pains to much longer!Fears??Even though it's our third labor it's self is scary. Pain, my health,  babies health. Just a little fear of the what ifs.Getting a tubal done is a big fear. Never had any type of surgery.Not getting the fishy clamps,  just cut once & then burned.Any fears for you ladies as the big day gets closer??
title: 2 days!!!
